alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:13AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Phelps, southwestern Buffalo and eastern Dawson Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 212 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Lexington, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Overton around 225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Elm Creek and Odessa. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 245 and 263. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
